website_summaries.verdict: This moderately priced and highly detailed automobile is a fun way to send your Calico Critters across town or on a cross-country road trip.
pros: Seats up to 7 Calico Critter figures
Includes baby seats, seat belts, guide book, and map
cons: Doesn’t include any Calico Critter figures

customer_reviews.title: A very good car for a growing family.
customer_reviews.text: The rabbit family hasn't discovered contraception yet, so they needed a bigger car to fit all their little bunnies. You can easily fit up to 8 calicos in there, and the car seats for the babies are very cute, with a little blue belt to keep them safe. My daughter likes that the 2 back seats are adjustable and sometimes she removes them altogether and pretends the car is a moving van for Grandpa Bunny's antique furniture delivery business. Oh, the joy of being a 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: ESAB83

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 3 and 4 year old granddaughters not realizing that the car did not come with the critters. Shortly after I purchased the Critter Family for the Car. After only 1 week playing with the car the door snapped off entirely. Given the price of the car, close to $40.00) it should have lasted longer than a week. Very Disappointed. It does not stand up well to normal child play. Hopefully the manufacturer will respond.
customer_reviews.author: Margo Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Calico critters are my favorite toys to buy for my kids
customer_reviews.text: The little blue rubber bands are seatbelts, don’t throw them away! (Like I did...) My daughter loves this little van, it’s so cute and fits a lot of little critters at once. And you can take the seats out and make it a little camper van with the stove and table. Too cute. Calico critters are my favorite toys to buy for my kids. They sometimes go on sale, but not often, so jump on it when they do!
customer_reviews.author: dawnica

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cute, cute !
customer_reviews.text: Cute, cute, cute ! We bought these Calico Critters, their house, car, and little bunny friends for out grand-daughters to play with when they are visiting our house. They REALLY love them. I think the Calico Critters set are their FAVORITE toys. They love them sooo much, that when it is time to put away the toys, all the toys go in the toy box and closet EXCEPT the Calico Critters. These have a special place on the fireplace hearth. The Calico Critters are the very first toys our grand-daughter go to every time they come to visit. I think we need to buy more of the set for Christmas !
customer_reviews.author: Don Y

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter liked it initially but even she got tired of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter for Christmas & was surprised at how cheap it felt as I attached decals etc. The seats and car seats don't stay in the car and the doors open constantly. My granddaughter liked it initially but even she got tired of the doors coming open all the time and the carseats and seats falling out. I sent it back - $30 is a ridiculous price for this cheap item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with how cheap this (and other calico critters stuff) feels. The seats don't clip in and fall out constantly (to the dismay of my three year old.) We also have a lil woodzee car from Target and it's honestly way better quality.
customer_reviews.author: SuperJenn

customer_reviews.title: Great to use with any small people/animal toys!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy even without the calico critter animals it's designed for. The open top and large easy-to-open doors make it easy for smaller children to get their toys in and out, and it holds a lot of small people/animals! The seats can be rearranged/reclined/removed, which gives a lot of possibilities. We bought one of these for one of our children as a gift, and it was such a hit that we ended up getting one for our other child, too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: nabibarr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old loves this. It’s sturdy and even has little baby seats. The center bench can also lie flat as a bed. Does not come with any critters.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just like the callico critter camper, the doors come off way too easily. So easily that it hinders play. These toys are much too expensive to have these problems. Also the wheels make a terrible noise when it is pushed just like the other callico critter vehicles I have purchased. Really cute though, and it holds ALOT of critters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not very durable
customer_reviews.text: This van is very adorable and my kids love it. I love all the details. It isn’t very durable. All of the hinges are pretty delicate. My kids are very careful but one of the trunk hinges already broke off. It still functions and is played with often, I just wish it was a bit more durable, especially for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: I expected more
customer_reviews.text: The critters are super cute and very well made, the van however is cheap. The door on one side keeps breaking off and has to be reconnected all the time. The plastic is cheap and the seats do not stay in place and move around the inside of the van. I am really disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: MFsays

customer_reviews.title: Good toy.
customer_reviews.text: Great to have an accessory where so many critters can be included. Rubber band seat belts for the included car seats were a little difficult for my three year old grandchild to maneuver. However, the Seven Seater provides her with much enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Rho

customer_reviews.title: Yes.  Get this!
customer_reviews.text: This 7 seater carries about 15 CC figures between the house, stores and Park! The infant seats are usually hanging off the back. It’s neat how the seats can be moved or laid flat for more play! Definitely one my granddaughter plays with a lot. Sometimes the LOLs borrow it for a road trip!
customer_reviews.author: shopgirl

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My little niece likes "families" of anything, even rocks she picks up in the driveway, so this is exactly what I was looking for , along with six of the rabbit family figures. It seems fragile so I warned her about opening and closing the doors too much.
customer_reviews.author: Pilar

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts/pieces
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the CC Family Seven Seater for my 10 year granddaughter in another state.We opened together on FaceTime.The followin pieces are missing. Rubber bands,stickers,map and guide.She is not happy.I have not figured out how to have them replace. Anyone have a clue of how to do this without sending the van back and hope the new one is complete?
customer_reviews.author: Irene E. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: was a must have on daughter's bday list. so cute and comes with removable car seats :)
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Love it all.
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest toy set. My granddaughter plays with it all the time. It’s not only adorable, but playable and durable! Will continue to purchase pieces so she can enjoy for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Wellock

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Grandson asked specifically for this and was very happy to receive. Fun toy line
customer_reviews.author: Ardith

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: got as a gift for niece and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was thrilled to have this "ride" for his Calico Critters. He's obsessed with loading them up, driving them around the house, then unloading them in a new location.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Tooooooo expensive!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! However very cheaply made and the does not merit a $30.00 price. Design is so cute though. Would never buy it for a 3 or 4 yr. old.
customer_reviews.author: betsy

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves this for her “babies” (calico critter family). Even had car seats.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: This could not be any cuter. The kids love putting the critter family inside and moving them around. One of the cutest toys out there especially for the animal lover girl.
customer_reviews.author: Chardonnay

customer_reviews.title: Really cool.
customer_reviews.text: She loved being able to put so many calico critters in this vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute BUT to many parts
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids like it but its easier to pull the seats out and stuff the critters inside. Built well but.. not worth the money! Wish I had bought the bus.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product.
customer_reviews.text: The whole family can go now. My calico critters Rabbit family.
customer_reviews.author: veronica hymer

customer_reviews.title: Calico Critters Family Van
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute addition to the Calico Critters collection. Nice to be able to accommodate the entire family in one vehicle. This was for a new collector, so I'm sure there will be many more to come. Packaging and delivery were good.
customer_reviews.author: book-kritik

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but the kids like seeing animal families versus all the other doll out ...
customer_reviews.text: Calico Critters are CUTE! A little pricey but the kids like seeing animal families versus all the other doll out there that are human based. I know that seems silly but it adds a little whimsy to their play time. Well made and seem to be a toy that will last the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Spacco

customer_reviews.title: This car is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It came with three car seats for babies and the doors open up. It is very good quality and my daughter loves it for all her calico critters!
customer_reviews.author: Momof4

customer_reviews.title: Cheap beep beep - and there is no horn
customer_reviews.text: My kid will break the door within a half an hour.
customer_reviews.author: ian

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my niece and she loved it! Came exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: It is cute however it's very flimsy. Cheaply made for this price. I expected at least a little bit harder plastic but it's made of thin plastic and easily broken. I would have loved to buy more of this line but now I need to think twice.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was much better than we expected, very sturdy and it's features were a nice surprise. Children love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Not for young children
customer_reviews.text: Product is difficult for small children to play with. Seats don't lock into place. Doors come off easily when they try to open them
customer_reviews.author: C K

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Darling van! Bought this for my 4yr old but our 2 and 6yr old love it just much. Wish the luggage was still being manufactured. Only complaint is the seat belts for the carseats (a single rubberband) is tricky for the kids to putt on and so way to lose!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the Calico Critters line.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 year old granddaughter got a lot of the critters for Christmas so this was a cute addition.
customer_reviews.author: Sue S.

customer_reviews.title: Calico Critters have great toys for children but are a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 4 year old grandson's birthday, he loves it! He likes that the door open, the back door opens and the seats are movable. Calico Critters have great toys for children but are a little pricey. My 5 yr. old granddaughter loves it too, she has the car and they both play with them using their imagination for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Happyfeet

customer_reviews.title: Nice big car
customer_reviews.text: The entire rabbit family (mom, dad, brother, sister, 3 babies and grandma) fit in the van. My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Aspengirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sure it will be big hit since this is for Christmas 2017
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: No critters included!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t usually write reviews but pretty deceptive to have the main listing picture shows SEVEN little critters in the van and then open the box and find only...a van. The van is probably fine but we bought it for the critters in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mt. Capra

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Granddaughters play with this for a long time with their critter friends.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: This van is awesome! Fits 7 plus many babies!
customer_reviews.text: Calico Critters are the best and this can doent disappoint. It def fits a lot more Critters if they’re babies. So cute, well made and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: amy lavadour

customer_reviews.title: A Fun Ride!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty well made. Price is fair for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Forth

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality very easy to move around fits a lot of critters
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Not very durrable
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely cute, but I don't like how the doors come off so easily, and after a few months it already lost a wheel. The red car has withstood two years of abuse, but this one just isn't the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Take a ride through critter town in your new van
customer_reviews.text: What critter family doesn't need a van to get around critter town in? Is so cute and a must for pulling the camper
customer_reviews.author: britlite3

customer_reviews.title: She loved it this gift from Santa
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great but the house could have connected a little better.
customer_reviews.author: TWHITE43

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was another piece we added to my granddaughters collection and she loves it as well.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The van doors fall off really easily. I expected it to be a bit sturdier than it was.

customer_reviews.title: Best car ever!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter is in love with this 7 seater! You can pack up the families and go!

customer_reviews.title: Great Van for Kids
customer_reviews.text: My grandaughter LOVED this van - and played with it constantly - Christmas present. Very durable.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable little car
customer_reviews.text: Adorable little car, fits all the critters. My 7 years old granddaughter loves it, so does my 2 years old grandson. Great shipper, very fast.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a terrific toy. Someone else got the grand daughter some critters, and the van got stuffed. Well made and enjoyed seeing her have so much fun.

customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. The rubber band seat belts for the car seats are a little big and don't stay put unless you twist them.

customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter, who is three, loves Calico Critters. Her mommy saves it up high for when little brother is asleep. This van was a big hit for Christmas; she was so excited to take it home and add it to the house and twin bunnies we got her previously.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I really like Calico Critters for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law experienced his first time with having to attach the stickers to a toy for the finished look. My grand-daughter loves it and put other guest inside for a ride other than just her new Calico Critters Family. She loves what ever is small these days...perfect for her interest. Just wish the prices were not so high. My daughter had these same toys and now her daughter has them too. It's an enduring toy and not just a fad play thing. That was important to me when picking out gifts.

customer_reviews.title: My Grandaughter will love it!

customer_reviews.title: but then again most Calico Critter items are like that. Fits perfectly with the camper
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, my daughter loves it. Price is a bit steep, but then again most Calico Critter items are like that. Fits perfectly with the camper.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for the Quality
customer_reviews.text: Like all Calico Critters toys, this is overpriced, but I'd say this is even more overpriced than other Calico Critters toys. I was expecting better quality for the price. It feels cheap. The plastic is thin and the doors feel like they would snap off if a child opened them too far. I collect Calico Critters toys because they were my favorite toys when I was a girl. I have boys that play with them occasionally, and that's why I thought they would like this vehicle. But due to the poor quality, I feel I cannot let them play with it much and have to watch them carefully so they won't break it. Disappointed, but I still love Calico Critters.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Seats fall out!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little car, but the seats keep coming out of it. I would not recommend this car.

customer_reviews.title: Appears sturdy and well built

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I give it 2 stars because the car is fine, but for $37 I want working headlights
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT COME WITH THE RABBITS. I ordered this without reading it carefully. Even the box it comes in shows the rabbits in the car! There are NO rabbits, it's a $37 car. My daughter opened the box excited about the rabbits...alas, no rabbits. I give it 2 stars because the car is fine, but for $37 I want working headlights, metal, a battery operated motor, something other than plastic. FALSE ADVERTISING.
customer_reviews.author: jemar

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, careful with babies in the house.
customer_reviews.text: Niece loves it. Sleeps with it, and takes it everywhere she goes. There are some very small pieces that come in the set, such as a baby bottle for one of the tiny bunnies. Keep out of the hands of babies that go to the mouth with everything.

It has a nice attention to detail, with a few stickers that are used to decorate the van and to create a tiny foldable map and guide book for the critters to use.

customer_reviews.title: Good van.
customer_reviews.text: Grat for what it is, plastic van with opening doors and trunk. My son just turned 4, and the back two seats pop out a lot while he's playing with it. He does love putting those critters in the car seats and having so many ride inside.

customer_reviews.title: Okay when used without figures inside
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a red car recently and the kids loved it so much they fought over who got to play with it, so I opted to buy another car. This one is okay, but not as good as the red one. The seats have to be attached, and they don't stay put, so when playing with the car the seats come out and send the family figurines rolling about the car.

customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVED this little car for the two days that they had it. Then the wheel popped off and would not go back on 😡

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed in every single detail
customer_reviews.text: My 9 years old girl loves Calico Critters, they are very well designed in every single detail. A bit pricey, though.

customer_reviews.title: the vehicle is cute and makes a good place to keep the critters when not being played ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the 'baby' car seats arrived with a piece broken off. Otherwise, the vehicle is cute and makes a good place to keep the critters when not being played with.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela DiMuzio

product_meta.title: Calico Critters Family Seven Seater
product_meta.description: Style:Family Seven Seater| Design:SingleCalico Critter families love traveling around Calico Village together in the Family Seven Seater! With two detachable seats, and three child seats included, this is the car for you if you've got a large brood to look after. As well as plenty of space inside, this car also comes with a book to prevent the little ones from getting restless, and a map to make sure you don't get lost. Calico Critters is a unique and adorable range of distinctive animal characters with charming and beautifully detailed homes, furniture and accessories. They live, work and play in an idyllic and wonderful place called Calico Village. These timeless, classic toys promote wholesome family values. These life-like, award-winning miniatures also inspire imagination and creativity. These adorable toys promote healthy cognitive development through pretend play. Acting out storylines will exercise narrative and critical thinking processes, while fine motor skills and dexterity improve as little ones manipulate the fun environments, critters and accessories. Critters sold separately
feature_bullets: Includes two detachable seats, 3 baby seats with safety straps, map, and guide book. Doors open, wheels rotate, second row seats are moveable to enable changes in seating orientation
Can be used independently or with all Calico Critters accessories
Mix and match with other Calico Critters play sets to create a whole Calico Critters village!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
